13_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd.body: You can use a base64 image within your so you do not have to host your images. Simply Google base64 images convert for an online file converter... copy that base64 image text into the img tag above... :)

4_1AqXhGEgfmdaUUsvNp3GL9pueqqLbHMkXp.body: KODI is not very good it simply installs plugins which are nothing more than glorified web pages linking to content.
